goal: Build a reusable library with TypeScript, comprehensive tests, and npm publishing configuration

steps.task: Create library core: (1) TypeScript with strict mode, (2) Dual CJS/ESM output configuration, (3) At least 3 exported functions/classes implementing the core functionality, (4) JSDoc comments on all exports, (5) types.d.ts generation, (6) package.json with proper main/module/types fields.

Write comprehensive tests: (1) Unit tests for every exported function/class, (2) Edge case tests (null input, empty arrays, boundary values), (3) Type safety tests if applicable, (4) Code coverage setup and reporting, (5) All tests pass with good coverage.

Publishing and CI setup: (1) GitHub Actions for CI (lint, test, build on PR), (2) GitHub Actions for npm publish on release tag, (3) .npmignore or files field in package.json, (4) Semantic versioning setup, (5) Do not modify library code.

Finalize: (1) README with installation, API reference, and usage examples, (2) CHANGELOG.md, (3) Verify CJS and ESM imports both work, (4) All tests pass, (5) npm pack succeeds and includes only intended files.
